constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 125 (Friday, July 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. POSEY:
H.R. 4482.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 1, Article 8, Clause 1: The Congress shall have
Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises,
to pay the Debts and provide for the common Defense and
general Welfare of the United States; but all Duties, Imposts
and Excises shall be uniform throughout the United States;
[Page H3634]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: EITC and ACTC Eligibility Verification Act
